channel.title: Login Issues,
channel.description: Okay, so I have my server files on 2 computers, If I run the server on the computer I have downstairs, it works, people can login and everything. If I run the server on the computer I have upstairs. No one can log in, not even me. They are the exact same files.. So I don't know what the problem is :/ help ?

item.title: Login Issues,
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Yeah, both computers are connected to the same wifi… On my router you have to specify which computer you’re hosting off of, which I switched. Still doesn’t work, but if I chance the client to localhost ip I can login, as soon as a change to the public IP it just fucks up.

Read full topic

item.title: Login Issues,
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Are both computers connected to the same wifi/ethernet? Check your ipv4 adress for both computers and compare them, and double check your portforwarding. Let me know how that goes.

Read full topic
